title: Holidays with no technology
description: Holidays with no smartphone, Internet connection, or TV. Lot of newspapers, books and activities to rediscover a life without (or limited) technology. Can be a camping holiday or a beach village with a common denominator. Can have different levels of isolations (telephones YES/NO, tv YES/NO, etc...) in order to make people gradually choice their plan.
pros: Can have for sure a market for the product
Can be a nice experience for people
Can work everywhere in the world
Tourism is an high margin market
cons: Never worked with travel companies, zero knowledge of the market
No MVP, needs massive initial budget
No tech involved, but I'm a tech guy! :-P
Easy to be copied by bigger companies. Can kill my company in seconds
